description: nude female figures clinging to a rock in the ocean and writhing in the water; some of the women wear flower or coral garlands on their heads--woman near center has bright orange-red garland; another figure and large winged creature at top of rock; celestial ghostly figures float along the horizon line at right, extending downward into the water; frame received detached from painting
title: Les Océanides (Les Naiades de la mer)
